## Hello!

Welcome to my website! My name is Sophie Vargas and I hope you enjoy getting to know me.

I grew up in Healdsburg, California but have been living in Santa Barbara the past four years. I have a passion for protecting our environment and hope to pursue a career that allows me to do this.

## Education

B.S. Environmental Science UCSB (2024)
